biotools.summary: VAP is a versatile aggregate profiler for efficient genome-wide data representation and discovery. VAP was designed to be used by biologists and bioinformaticians to analyze genomic datasets to generate aggregate or individual profiles of groups of genes / annotations / regions of interest from their genome of interest.
